entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
